data.text:
As the airline partner of the retrospective showcase, we will be flying Kusama work via Cathay Pacific Cargo to M+, which will serve as a portal to the artist’s kaleidoscopic universe in the months to come. 

Explore Kusama’s world with us at M+ from November to next May!

data.text: 𝐇otel, 𝐄cho, 𝐋ima, 𝐋ima, 𝐎scar👋! There’s another one for aviation enthusiasts🤓. data.text: Eating at a dai pai dong is a quintessential Hong Kong foodie experience 😋. At these open-air eateries, friends and families would gather around a table for Cantonese dishes. The secret to their authentic taste? Cooking on giant fiery woks 🔥. https://t.co/Lg2Xt7bMtA

urls.title: Severe tropical storm Ma-on is affecting our flights to/from Hong Kong International Airport
urls.description: There are currently no important alerts. Click "View all "to read our travel advisories. We're waiving ticket change and cancellation fees, so you can rearrange your plans easily. View our special ticketing guidelines to learn more. Contact your travel agent directly to organise changes. If you have questions that require a response, please contact us for assistance. Your feedback will help us improve our website experience. Your feedback will help us improve our website experience.

data.text: For details, please visit https://t.co/T0tRwUxCh6

We expect the severe tropical storm #MaOn will disrupt our operation schedule to/from Hong Kong on 25 August. Please ensure your contact details are up to date in Manage Booking to receive the latest flight updates and  check your flight status before coming to the airport. https://t.co/tKCD7Yn1KK

urls.title: Travel Restrictions - COVID-19 Updates - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: There are currently no important alerts. Click "View all "to read our travel advisories. We know travel restrictions may change at short notice. That’s why we’re doing everything we can to keep you up-to-date with current COVID-19 travel requirements to help you plan ahead. Before you travel, make sure to review the latest travel restrictions to ensure you’re eligible to fly. We also highly recommend checking the official government website of your destination country for the latest information. Travel

With spontaneous challenges now and then, Sam has risen to the tasks. “Sometimes, we must deal with sudden maintenance needs that require immediate action. Luckily, I work with such an amazing and efficient team that we always get the job done 💪🏻!”

data.text: “I have always been fascinated by airplanes since I was a kid💭. I also loved physics and maths, so naturally, I chose aeronautical engineering for my career 🛠,” Sam explains.
